pdf.step1: Red lines in the PDF define apartment boundaries
pdf.step2: The algorithm automatically detects closed areas
pdf.step3: If a clean image is uploaded, polygons will be placed on it
pdf.clean_image_desc: If you have the same plan in a clean format (without lines), upload it here. Polygons will be placed on this image.

zones.viewbox_auto_desc: ViewBox is automatically determined based on image size
